name: Law & Order: Legacies
description:
Law & Order: Legacies is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Telltale Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Law & Order: Legacies is available on PC.
Dave Felton and Jason Lars Berquist produced the game. It was scored by Jared Emerson-Johnson and Mike Post.
